verses.verse: The <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3927>Lemuel<s%>; the <S%H4853>oracle<s%> which his <S%H517>mother<s%> taught <S%H3256>him<s%>.
What <S%H1248><s%>, my son? and <S%H1248>what<s%>, O son of my <S%H990>womb<s%>? And <S%H1248>what<s%>, O son of my <S%H5088>vows<s%>?
Give <S%H5414><s%> not thy <S%H2428>strength<s%> unto <S%H802>women<s%>, Nor thy <S%H1870>ways<s%> to that which <S%H4229>destroyeth<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%>.

It is not for <S%H4428>kings<s%>, O <S%H3927>Lemuel<s%>, it is not for <S%H4428>kings<s%> to <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%>; Nor <S%H335>for<s%> <S%H7336>princes<s%> to <S%H7941>say<s%>, Where is strong drink?
Lest they <S%H8354>drink<s%>, and <S%H7911>forget<s%> the <S%H2710>law<s%>, And <S%H8138>pervert<s%> the <S%H1779>justice<s%> due to any that is <S%H1121>afflicted<s%>.
Give <S%H5414><s%> strong <S%H7941>drink<s%> unto him that is ready to <S%H6>perish<s%>, And <S%H3196>wine<s%> unto the <S%H4751>bitter<s%> in <S%H5315>soul<s%>:
Let him <S%H8354>drink<s%>, and <S%H7911>forget<s%> his <S%H7389>poverty<s%>, And <S%H2142>remember<s%> his misery no <S%H5999>more<s%>.
Open <S%H6605><s%> thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%> for the <S%H483>dumb<s%>, In the <S%H1779>cause<s%> of all such as are <S%H1121>left<s%> <S%H2475>desolate<s%>.
Open <S%H6605><s%> thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H6664>righteously<s%>, And <S%H1777>minister<s%> justice to the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H6041>needy<s%>.
A <S%H2428>worthy<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> who can <S%H4672>find<s%>? For her <S%H4377>price<s%> is <S%H7350>far<s%> above <S%H6443>rubies<s%>.
The <S%H3820>heart<s%> of her <S%H1167>husband<s%> <S%H982>trusteth<s%> in <S%H2637>her<s%>, And he shall have no lack of <S%H7998>gain<s%>.
She <S%H1580>doeth<s%> him <S%H2896>good<s%> and not <S%H7451>evil<s%> All the <S%H3117>days<s%> of her <S%H2416>life<s%>.
She <S%H1875>seeketh<s%> <S%H6785>wool<s%> and <S%H6593>flax<s%>, And <S%H6213>worketh<s%> <S%H2656>willingly<s%> with her <S%H3709>hands<s%>.
She is like the <S%H935>merchant-ships<s%>; She bringeth her <S%H3899>bread<s%> from <S%H4801>afar<s%>.
She <S%H6965>riseth<s%> also while it is yet <S%H3915>night<s%>, And <S%H5414>giveth<s%> <S%H2964>food<s%> to her <S%H1004>household<s%>, And their <S%H2706>task<s%> to her <S%H5291>maidens<s%>.
She <S%H2161>considereth<s%> a <S%H7704>field<s%>, and <S%H3947>buyeth<s%> <S%H6529>it<s%>; With the fruit of her <S%H3709>hands<s%> she <S%H5193>planteth<s%> a <S%H3754>vineyard<s%>.
She <S%H2296>girdeth<s%> her <S%H4975>loins<s%> with <S%H5797>strength<s%>, And maketh <S%H5797>strong<s%> her <S%H2220>arms<s%>.
She <S%H2938>perceiveth<s%> that her <S%H5504>merchandise<s%> is <S%H2896>profitable<s%>: Her <S%H5216>lamp<s%> goeth not <S%H3518>out<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%>.
She <S%H7971>layeth<s%> her <S%H3027>hands<s%> to the <S%H6418>distaff<s%>, And her <S%H3709>hands<s%> <S%H8551>hold<s%> the <S%H3601>spindle<s%>.
She stretcheth <S%H6566>out<s%> her <S%H3709>hand<s%> to the <S%H6041>poor<s%>; <S%H7971>Yea<s%>, she reacheth forth her <S%H3027>hands<s%> to the <S%H34>needy<s%>.
She is not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of the <S%H7950>snow<s%> for her <S%H1004>household<s%>; For all her <S%H1004>household<s%> are <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H8144>scarlet<s%>.
She <S%H6213>maketh<s%> for herself carpets of <S%H4765>tapestry<s%>; Her <S%H3830>clothing<s%> is fine <S%H8336>linen<s%> and <S%H713>purple<s%>.
Her <S%H1167>husband<s%> is <S%H3045>known<s%> in the <S%H8179>gates<s%>, When he <S%H3427>sitteth<s%> among the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>.
She <S%H6213>maketh<s%> <S%H5466>linen<s%> garments and <S%H4376>selleth<s%> <S%H5414>them<s%>, And delivereth <S%H2289>girdles<s%> unto the <S%H3669>merchant<s%>.
Strength <S%H5797><s%> and <S%H1926>dignity<s%> are her <S%H3830>clothing<s%>; And she <S%H7832>laugheth<s%> at the <S%H3117>time<s%> to <S%H314>come<s%>.
She <S%H6605>openeth<s%> her <S%H6310>mouth<s%> with <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>; And the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H2617>kindness<s%> is on her <S%H3956>tongue<s%>.
She looketh <S%H6822>well<s%> to the <S%H1979>ways<s%> of her <S%H1004>household<s%>, And <S%H398>eateth<s%> not the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H6104>idleness<s%>.
Her <S%H1121>children<s%> rise <S%H6965>up<s%>, and call her <S%H833>blessed<s%>; Her <S%H1167>husband<s%> <S%H1984>also<s%>, and he praiseth her, saying:
Many <S%H7227><s%> <S%H1323>daughters<s%> have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2428>worthily<s%>, But thou excellest them <S%H5927>all<s%>.
Grace <S%H2580><s%> is <S%H8267>deceitful<s%>, and <S%H3308>beauty<s%> is <S%H1892>vain<s%>; But a <S%H802>woman<s%> that <S%H3373>feareth<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, she shall be <S%H1984>praised<s%>.
Give <S%H5414><s%> her of the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of her <S%H3027>hands<s%>; And let her <S%H4639>works<s%> <S%H1984>praise<s%> her in the <S%H8179>gates<s%>.
